comments:
3.3M4

1) Create a DialogTray that will throw an NPE in its createContents() method
2) Create a TrayDialog and set its tray to the above tray
3) attempt to close the dialog

You will get NPEs in closeTray() that result in a Dialog that cannot be closed.  This is especially bad if it's modal.

Created an attachment (id=56633)
patch

Patch that fixes the closing problem by only committing to the tray if createControl runs without exception.
